bibl.title: Dative and Genitive Case Interchange in Greek Papyri.
Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.

bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Dative case syncretism. - 3. Previously found examples. - 4. Finding case interchange. - 5. Interpreting case interchange. - 6. Analysis of genitive for dative interchange. - 7. Analysis of examples. Dative for genitive interchange. - 8. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Joanne Vera Stolk, Dative and Genitive Case Interchange in Greek Papyri.

Tomasz Derda, Adam Łajtar & Jakub Urbanik (edd.), in cooperation with Andrzej Mirończuk & Tomasz Ochała, Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology, Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013. Volume II. Subliterary Papyri, Documentary Papyri, Scribal Practices, Linguistic Matters = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVIII (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 1305-1324.

1. Introduction. - 2. Dative case syncretism. - 3. Previously found examples. - 4. Finding case interchange. - 5. Interpreting case interchange. - 6. Analysis of genitive for dative interchange. - 7. Analysis of examples. Dative for genitive interchange. - 8. Conclusion.
